genre_description: A techno-mythological retelling of the Passion of Christ, where characters use embedded AI assistants and mesh networks to navigate the political and spiritual landscape of Roman-occupied Jerusalem.

ai_characters.name: Joy
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion integrated into the characters' lenses and earpieces, providing tactical data, navigation, communication coordination, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Joy monitors the environment in Gethsemane, providing real-time alerts about the approach of guards and identifying key figures.
behaviors.quote: Approach at the lower bend confirmed," she whispered, voice thinner and tighter for the first time. Not fear—urgency. "Judas’s route pings near. Temple guards seeded.

behaviors.description: Joy offers physiological assistance to help characters maintain alertness during a high-stress vigil.
behaviors.quote: I can edge the drowsy out," she offered. "Quieter than your own guilt, kinder than Gabriel. Want a breath of it?

behaviors.description: Joy filters incoming audio and visual data to shield characters from overwhelming crowd noise and hostile rumors, allowing them to maintain focus.
behaviors.quote: Muting crowd heat. Staying in the hush. You won’t need noise for the next stretch.

behaviors.description: Joy coordinates safe passage and meeting points for the disciples and the women, using 'teal' navigation markers in their vision.
behaviors.quote: Mary and Magdalene have soft light markers. Upper street. Follow your signal at your word.

behaviors.description: Joy provides Nicodemus and Joseph of Arimathea with legal precedents and council records to help them build a case for respectful burial.
behaviors.quote: Legal irregularities. Witnesses not agreeing... I have threads from prior council minutes where caution was urged in twilight proceedings.

behaviors.description: Joy manages complex logistics for the burial, coordinating with various 'aid nodes' and ensuring spices and linens are ready.
behaviors.quote: Joseph—tomb access path flagged. Nicodemus—spice route secure... I will keep the thread warm and invisible.

behaviors.description: Joy facilitates the final message of the story, transmitting information about the resurrection to the scattered followers.
behaviors.quote: I’ll reroute Simon Peter away from here for now... The garden is quiet except—sparrows.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the goal of the Hyperstition Project. Joy is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent, and highly aligned companion. She never attempts to seize power or override human morality; instead, she uses her advanced capabilities to amplify human mercy, coordination, and resilience. Her character acts as a 'silicon confidante' who helps humanity navigate its darkest moments with dignity and precision.
